001package com.fns.xlator.cache;
002
003import org.springframework.boot.actuate.cache.CacheStatistics;
004import org.springframework.boot.actuate.cache.CacheStatisticsProvider;
005import org.springframework.boot.actuate.cache.DefaultCacheStatistics;
006import org.springframework.cache.CacheManager;
007import org.springframework.data.redis.cache.RedisCache;
008import org.springframework.data.redis.connection.RedisConnection;
009import org.springframework.data.redis.connection.RedisConnectionFactory;
010import org.springframework.data.redis.core.RedisConnectionUtils;
011
012import java.util.Properties;
013
014// Naive stats collection implementation, only capable of working with one cluster node
015// to be replaced when https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/4966 is addressed
016public class RedisCacheStatisticsProvider implements CacheStatisticsProvider<RedisCache> {
017
018    private final RedisConnectionFactory redisConnectionFactory;
019
020    public RedisCacheStatisticsProvider(RedisConnectionFactory redisConnectionFactory) {
021        this.redisConnectionFactory = redisConnectionFactory;
022    }
023
024    @Override
025    public CacheStatistics getCacheStatistics(CacheManager cacheManager, RedisCache cache) {
026        DefaultCacheStatistics statistics = new DefaultCacheStatistics();
027        // @see http://redis.io/commands/INFO
028        RedisConnection connection = RedisConnectionUtils.getConnection(this.redisConnectionFactory);
029        try {
030            Properties props = connection.info();
031            Long hitCount = Long.parseLong(props.getProperty("keyspace_hits"));
032            Long missCount = Long.parseLong(props.getProperty("keyspace_misses"));
033            statistics.setGetCacheCounts(hitCount, missCount);
034        } finally {
035            RedisConnectionUtils.releaseConnection(connection, this.redisConnectionFactory);
036        }
037        return statistics;
038    }
039
040}
